body_html:
@avmgithub as far as I know this should not be architecture dependent. It looks like the changes might just be differences in variable naming (maybe that is not deterministic?)

It's a little hard for me to read a the output as a diff, it would really help me if you could run the following on your machine

python test/test_jit.py TestScript.test_lstm_fusion_cuda --accept

(this will modify test/expect/TestScript.test_lstm_fusion_cuda-backward.expect)
and then upload test/expect/TestScript.test_lstm_fusion_cuda-backward.expect.

Thank you!

body:
@avmgithub as far as I know this should not be architecture dependent. It looks like the changes might just be differences in variable naming (maybe that is not deterministic?) 

It's a little hard for me to read a the output as a diff, it would really help me if you could run the following on your machine
```
python test/test_jit.py TestScript.test_lstm_fusion_cuda --accept 
```
(this will modify test/expect/TestScript.test_lstm_fusion_cuda-backward.expect)
and then upload `test/expect/TestScript.test_lstm_fusion_cuda-backward.expect`.

Thank you!
